snippet.title: DROD Promo Trailer
snippet.description: DROD is an indie puzzle-adventure game franchise.  It features hand-crafted puzzles, heavy strategy and tactics, turn-based mechanics and a 2D top-down tile-based view.

localized.title: DROD Promo Trailer
localized.description: DROD is an indie puzzle-adventure game franchise.  It features hand-crafted puzzles, heavy strategy and tactics, turn-based mechanics and a 2D top-down tile-based view.
